name: Tech Ninjas: The RPG
description:
Become a tech ninja, take apart Chromebooks, save your friends, and much more in this RPG! Play as Penny, a girl who broke her Chromebook, and travel through the Chromebook dimension! Also, this game is so cliche, and there's a joke about twilight! Have fun!

The game has been updated! You can now beat the game! (v1.0)

Also the map design and ending was rushed a little, since I had such a short period of time to create it.
